manifest.changelog:
@iamzainnnn's instafel backup V6

 Changed the way draft works.
(The draft will be hidden whenever it is empty.)
 Added the saved audio option in the reels gallery.
(Now you can see your saved audio directly from the reels gallery.)
 Activated collab notes.
(not working yet, i hope it will start working soon.)
 Enabled auto follow back option.(private accounts)
Now you can set permission to auto confirm the following request.
 Enabled new sticker tabs.
(now you can see new sticker packs.)
 Enabled recent stickers.
(Now you can see all your recently used stickers in sticker tab.)
 Enabled voice message background playback.
(Now you can listen to voice messages out of the chat.)
 Activated new gallery picker menu.
( thanks to @NightX24)
 Added take a pic option in the profile upload section.
(Now you can take a live selfie to upload a profile picture.)
 Enabled crosspot settings for personal accounts.
 Changed some button design.
 Changed corner radius in some elements.
 Changed tab icon position.
 Some minor changes and bug fixes.
manifest.description: This backup maked for the newest features!
